item.title: How I Built This Site
item.description: How I Built This Site Delightfully often, when I’ve combed the web for help designing, developing, and publishing sites, apps, I land on someone’s “How I Made This” post on their custom blog. That, or on StackOverflow, or on a Github issue, or increasingly these days on DEV. So this one goes out to all those paid it forward and lent me a hand. It still feels like nothing short of a miracle to publish a new site.
